snippet: President Obama nominated Dr. Vivek H. Murthy, an early supporter and grass-roots advocate for the Affordable Care Act, as surgeon general on Thursday.
abstract: Pres Obama nominates Dr Vivek H Murthy, early supporter and grass-roots advocate for the Affordable Care Act, as surgeon general.
lead_paragraph: President Obama nominated Dr. Vivek H. Murthy, an early supporter and grass-roots advocate for the Affordable Care Act, as surgeon general on Thursday.

headline.main: Obama Selects Health Policy Advocate as Surgeon General
headline.print_headline: Health Policy Advocate Selected for Surgeon General

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
